summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 BMW X5. THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V138000 (POWER TRAIN) AND NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V071000 (AIR BAGS) HAD EXCEEDED A REASONABLE TIME FOR THE REPAIR. THE CONTACT RECEIVED RECALL NOTIFICATION IN APRIL OF 2017 AND THE STERLING BMW DEALER LOCATED AT 21710 AUTO WORLD CIRCLE STERLING, VA 20166,  PHONE NUMBER: 571-933-8222 ADVISED THAT PARTS ARE NOT AVAILABLE FOR REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER ALSO ADVISED THAT PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE FOR REPAIR. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 123,000. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT. UPDATED 11/07/17*LJ  *JS
